Mike Pence , R-Ind., who is considering either a gubernatorial run or a White House bid, href="http://www.youtube.com/user/PBSNewsHour#p/u/2/bTebEafVeuY"> praised the Barack Obama 's nod toward American exceptionalism. The Barack Obama reflected on the uniqueness of America. He remembered our soldiers, he remembered where the strength of this nation was, Mike Pence said, before adding that he was disappointed that the Barack Obama appeared to be`` committed to more spending and more government and more of the same of what the American people rejected on Election Day last fall.
